mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "bug" (name, test_case_id, project_id, module_id, "requirement_id", task_id, handler, "describe",create_by, create_time, bug_type, severity_type, bug_status) VALUES ( #{name}, #{testCaseId}, #{projectId}, #{moduleId}, #{requirementId}, #{taskId}, #{handler}, #{describe}, #{createBy}, #{createTime},'${bugType}','${severityType}','${bugStatus}');
mapper.update: update "bug" set name = #{name}, project_id = #{projectId}, module_id = #{moduleId}, requirement_id = #{requirementId}, task_id = #{taskId}, handler = #{handler}, describe = #{describe}, bug_status = '${bugStatus}', severity_type='${severityType}' where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.bug_type, a.project_id, a.module_id, a.requirement_id, a.task_id, a."describe", a.severity_type, a.bug_status, a.handler, a.solve_by, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.solve_time, a.solution_type,a.solve_time, b.name project_name, c.name module_name, g.name requirement_name, i.name task_name, e.name handler_name, f.name create_by_name, h.name solve_by_name from "bug" a left join project b on a.project_id = b.id left join module c on c.id = a.module_id left join requirement g on g.id = a.requirement_id left join task i on i.id = a.task_id left join "user" e on e.id = a.handler left join "user" f on f.id = a.create_by left join "user" h on h.id = a.solve_by where a.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update "bug" set bug_status = '已解决', solve_time = now(), solve_by = #{loginUserId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select sum(case when x.bug_status = '激活' then 1 else 0 end) activeCnt, sum(case when x.bug_status = '已解决' then 1 else 0 end) fixedCnt, sum(case when x.bug_status = '已关闭' then 1 else 0 end) closeCnt from bug x
